item.title: Accidental Drug Related Deaths
item.description: Follow Me On Intro The opioid epidemic is a nationwide issue for the United States. Among the states Connecticut takes second place in terms of deaths from opioids in the years 2014-2015. As the years go on death rates are doubling from the abuse of opioids. Heroin overdoses continue to rise and now fentanyl is joining its ranks. Fentanyl has been getting mixed with heroin to increase its potency and in return it increases the chance of overdosing (Rondinone, 2017).
